portfolio.subtitle: Every piece tells a story, every line has purpose

sessions.subtitle: From concept to completion, we guide you through every step
sessions.guarantee: All work backed by our satisfaction guarantee

testimonials.quote: Jude absolutely smashed my sleeve design. The detail work is incredible and healed perfectly. Worth every penny.
testimonials.author: Marcus K.

testimonials.quote: Really happy with how my first tattoo turned out. Jude made me feel comfortable throughout and the studio is spotless.
testimonials.author: Emma R.

paragraphs: Saint Jude became the patron saint of lost causes and desperate situations. Our studio carries that spirit - we're here for the bold decisions, the meaningful moments, the ink that matters. Nestled in Manchester's creative Ancoats district, we've built something special on Silk Street.

Every tattoo that leaves our studio represents hours of careful planning, precise execution, and genuine care for our clients. We believe great tattoos come from understanding not just what you want, but why you want it. That's the Saint Jude difference.
about.callout: 78 five-star reviews don't lie - we're doing something right in Ancoats
about.imageAlt: Jude working on a detailed tattoo design

items.question: How far in advance should I book?
items.answer: We typically book 3-4 weeks out, but it varies depending on the size and complexity of your piece. Drop us a message and we'll work something out.

items.question: Do you do walk-ins?
items.answer: We focus on custom work which requires appointments, but if you're in the area and we have a gap, we might be able to chat about smaller pieces. Best to call ahead though.

items.question: What's your deposit policy?
items.answer: We require a £50 deposit to secure your appointment, which goes toward your final cost. Deposits are non-refundable but can be transferred if you need to reschedule with 48 hours notice.

finalCta.headline: Ready to start your next piece?
finalCta.subheadline: Let's discuss your vision and create something extraordinary together

booking.modalDescription: Tell us about your tattoo idea and we'll get back to you within 24 hours to discuss timing and pricing.
booking.successMessage: We'll review your request and get back to you within 24 hours to confirm your appointment.
booking.depositDisclaimer: A £50 deposit will be required to secure your appointment

footer.tagline: Ancoats' most trusted ink since day one
